name: World Wide Fund for Nature Belgium
goal: To stop the environmental deterioration of the planet and build a future where human beings can live in harmony with nature.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Environment, European Neighbourhood Policy, Fraud prevention, International co-operation and development, Trade
euInitiatives:
1. Strengthening Networks and Investigation for a more effective Implementation of the EU Timber Regulation (EUTR)”
funded by the EUROPEAN COMMISSION - DIRECTORATE-GENERAL MIGRATION AND HOME AFFAIRS - INTERNAL SECURITY FUND POLICE – 19249/DU
2. Wildlife Cybercrime - DIRECTORATE-GENERAL MIGRATION AND HOME AFFAIRS - n° 821180
3. Eat for change PADOR BE-2018-CLY-1809303444 - call for proposal 160048
